headline: Fears That ‘Democracy Probably Ends’ in Tanzania’s Election
text: NAIROBI, Kenya — With opposition figures harassed and arrested, news coverage severely restricted and social media mysteriously slowing down, many have come to two predictions about Tanzania’s election on Wednesday: The president will win. And the country will lose.
snippet: The Tanzanian president is nicknamed “the Bulldozer,” and he has brooked little dissent as he seeks a second term.
